title: Marvel Spotlight v1
description:
This torrent contains the complete run of Marvel Spotlight v1 (issues 1 - 33).

Marvel Spotlight got it&#039;s start in 1971 as a quarterly publication and issue number 1 featured the Native American hero, Red Wolf written by comic book legend, Gardner Fox.

Issue 2 featured the first appearance of Werewolf By Night with art by Mike Ploog. This feature ran for three issues and by issue 4 the title had been upgraded to a bi-monthly book, just in time for the introduction of Johhny Blaze as The Ghost Rider in issue 5, again art was handled by Mike Ploog.

Issue 12 introduced a spin-off character from Ghost Rider; Son of Satan, who was featured through issue 24 after which he received his own book.

The remaining issues featured a couple of random fillers as well as a Two issue run of The Moon Knight, and single issue stories featuring Sub Mariner, Nick Fury, Spider-woman and ending the series with Deathlok the Demolisher in issue 33 in early 1977.

This was a great series in it&#039;s day.

Thanks to the scanners and the original and varied sources.

Please seed. Please enjoy.
